attributes.action: Change ‘Vaccine Passports’, to ‘Immunity Passports’; recognise natural immunity.
attributes.additional_details: We are told to trust science, yet ignoring the fact that those who have suffered from a disease and recovered, have a robust defence against the virus- including COVID. Why is there no recognition for this? Please include people with proof of recovery/antibodies to the passport scheme.
attributes.background: The government must consider the benefits of natural immunity when finalising plans for ‘freedom’. If someone can prove they’ve recovered from COVID and have antibodies, they should have the same rights as a vaccinated person.
